content.heroText: Affordable & Professional solutions by Jaakko, a 16-year-old web developer from Finland.
content.aboutText1: Hey! I’m Jaakko Maatiala, 16 years old from Finland. I study programming at Keuda, and I’m passionate about building modern, responsive websites.
content.aboutText2: My skills include HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and various frameworks. I’m always eager to learn new technologies and improve my skills.

portfolio.title: Project 1
portfolio.description: Most of my projects are private, but I can show you some examples of my work. I have experience with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and various frameworks.

testimonials.author: Client from Finland
testimonials.text: Jaakko delivered our website quickly and professionally. Communication was smooth and the end result exceeded our expectations!

testimonials.author: Small Business Owner
testimonials.text: Very talented and reliable developer. Highly recommended for small business websites.
